thread.title: BRIEF-Health Insurance Innovations Q4 GAAP Earnings Per Share $0.30

title: BRIEF-Health Insurance Innovations Q4 GAAP Earnings Per Share $0.30
text: 41 PM / Updated 5 minutes ago BRIEF-Health Insurance Innovations Q4 GAAP Earnings Per Share $0.30 Reuters Staff Feb 28 (Reuters) - Health Insurance Innovations Inc : * HEALTH INSURANCE INNOVATIONS, INC. REPORTS RECORD FOURTH QUARTER AND FISCAL 2017 FINANCIAL AND OPERATING RESULTS * Q4 ADJUSTED EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.37 * Q4 GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.30 * SEES FY 2018 ADJUSTED EARNINGS PER SHARE $2.45 TO $2.55 * SEES FY 2018 REVENUE $290 MILLION TO $300 MILLION * QTRLY RECORD REVENUE WAS $69.5 MILLION, COMPARED TO $51.4 MILLION IN Q4 OF 2016 * Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.34, REVENUE VIEW $59.9 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S * FY2018 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $1.95, REVENUE VIEW $273.1 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
